name: Adrian Enriquez
summary: I am Adrian Enriquez, a freelance web developer based in Philippines. I am well versed with modern technology in designing and developing excellent web applications. I constantly aim to learn new and various things to accentuate my skills.

services.name: UI/UX Design
services.description: I sketch and wireframe interfaces for mobile and web, create UI mockups using moqups.com web app and Adobe Photoshop.

services.name: Front-end Development
services.description: I like converting PSD/mockups to HTML. I put in my superior skills in HTML(5) and CSS(3) to create responsive and pixel perfect design. I am an expert in twitter bootstrap framework, and familiar with other html/css frameworks like Foundation and Polymer. I am proficient in LESS/SCSS, Gulp.js, Grunt, Javascript, jQuery, and Angular.js.

services.name: Back-end Development
services.description: I am proficient in PHP and love using Laravel as a framework. I am also familiar with Node.js. I also develop REST APIs. I write clean codes using best practices and Object Oriented Programming (OOP).

services.name: Mobile Development
services.description: I develop mobile applications using Phonegap and Ionic Framework.

services.name: Content Management Sytem(CMS)
services.description: I can setup, customize and/or create Wordpress and Joomla Templates.

services.name: Other
services.description: In terms of databases, I am familiar with both SQL and no-sql functionalities such as MongoDB and Firebase. Also, I always use Version Control System for my projects such as Git and SVN.
